shape_0_per_frame1=sample=.002*instance;
shape_0_per_frame2=
shape_0_per_frame3=/////  Knot
shape_0_per_frame4=
shape_0_per_frame5=q10=q20*msample;
shape_0_per_frame6=msample=if(above(sample,.5),sample,.1*sample);
shape_0_per_frame7=
shape_0_per_frame8=my_x = sin(q10)+2*sin(2*q10);
shape_0_per_frame9=my_y = sin(3*q10);
shape_0_per_frame10=my_z = cos(q10)-2*cos(2*q10);
shape_0_per_frame11=
shape_0_per_frame12=
shape_0_per_frame13=/////// rotations... by flexi
shape_0_per_frame14=
shape_0_per_frame15=d = 5;
shape_0_per_frame16=zoom = 1;
shape_0_per_frame17=
shape_0_per_frame18=w3 = q2;
shape_0_per_frame19=w2 = q3;
shape_0_per_frame20=w1 = q1;
shape_0_per_frame21=
shape_0_per_frame22=x1 = cos(w1)*my_x + sin(w1)*my_y;
shape_0_per_frame23=y1 = -sin(w1)*my_x + cos(w1)*my_y;
shape_0_per_frame24=z1 = my_z;
shape_0_per_frame25=
shape_0_per_frame26=x2 = cos(w2)*x1 + sin(w2)*z1;
shape_0_per_frame27=z2 = -sin(w2)*x1 + cos(w2)*z1;
shape_0_per_frame28=y2 = y1;
shape_0_per_frame29=
shape_0_per_frame30=y3 = cos(w3)*y2 + sin(w3)*z2;
shape_0_per_frame31=z3 = -sin(w3)*y2 + cos(w3)*z2;
shape_0_per_frame32=x3 = x2;
shape_0_per_frame33=
shape_0_per_frame34=// perspective calculation
shape_0_per_frame35=
shape_0_per_frame36=l = sqrt(x3*x3 + y3*y3);
shape_0_per_frame37=w = atan2(x3,y3);
shape_0_per_frame38=p = tan(asin(1) + atan2(d+z3,l));
shape_0_per_frame39=d = sqrt(x3*x3 + y3*y3 + (z3+d)*(z3+d));
shape_0_per_frame40=
shape_0_per_frame41=my_x = zoom*sin(w)*p;
shape_0_per_frame42=my_y = zoom*cos(w)*p;
shape_0_per_frame43=
shape_0_per_frame44=x = 0.5 + my_x/q6;
shape_0_per_frame45=y = 0.5 + my_y/q5;
shape_0_per_frame46=
shape_0_per_frame47=
shape_0_per_frame48=rad=.25*sample;
shape_0_per_frame49=ang=sample*time*15;
shape_0_per_frame50=
shape_0_per_frame51=b=sample;
shape_0_per_frame52=g=b;
shape_0_per_frame53=r=b;

per_frame_1=chng=sin(time*.5);
per_frame_2=cthr=.9999;
per_frame_3=mq21=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq21);
per_frame_4=mq22=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq22);
per_frame_5=mq23=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq23);
per_frame_6=mq24=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq24);
per_frame_7=mq25=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq25);
per_frame_8=mq26=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq26);
per_frame_9=mq27=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1),mq27);
per_frame_10=mq28=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1),mq28);
per_frame_11=mq29=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1)*.3,mq29);
per_frame_12=mq31=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1)*.3,mq31);
per_frame_13=monitor=chng;
per_frame_14=q21=mq21;q22=mq22;q23=mq23;q24=mq24;q25=mq25;q26=mq26;
per_frame_15=q27=mq27;q28=mq28;q29=mq29;q31=mq31;
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=monitor=mq1;
per_frame_18=vol=bass+treb+mid;
per_frame_19=atime=atime+vol;
per_frame_20=q11=.4+sin(atime*.006        )*.4;
per_frame_21=q12=.4+cos(atime*.00613828348)*.4;
per_frame_22=q13=.4+sin(atime*.00598593455)*.4;
per_frame_23=monitor=q13;
per_frame_24=
per_frame_25=warp=0;
per_frame_26=wave_a=0;
per_frame_27=zoom=.998;
per_frame_28=
per_frame_29=q1=.20*time;
per_frame_30=q2=.12*time;
per_frame_31=q3=.24*time;
per_frame_32=
per_frame_33=q5=aspectx;
per_frame_34=q6=aspecty;
per_frame_35=
per_frame_36=
per_frame_37=q20=10053 +3*sin(.1*time);
per_frame_38=monitor=q20;
warp_1=`sampler sampler_fw_clouds;
warp_2=`shader_body
warp_3=`{// sample previous frame
warp_4=`ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_6=`                      ((uv.xyy*q27
warp_7=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_8=`                      ).xyz*
warp_9=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_10=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q29
warp_11=`                     );
warp_12=`if(ret.x> q21*q13         && ret.x<= q24*q11        )ret.y += (noise9).x*.5; 
warp_13=`if(ret.y> q22*q11         && ret.y<= q25*q12        )ret.z += (noise9).y*.5; 
warp_14=`if(ret.z> q23*q12         && ret.z<= q26*q13        )ret.x += (noise9).z*.5; 
warp_15=`float blur =sin(bass*90)*rad;
warp_16=`ret=0.125*(
warp_17=`GetPixel(float2(uv.x-0.01*blur,uv.y-0.01*blur)) +
warp_18=`GetPixel(float2(uv.x+0.01*blur,uv.y+0.01*blur)) +
warp_19=`GetPixel(float2(uv.x-0.01*blur,uv.y+0.01*blur)) +
warp_20=`GetPixel(float2(uv.x+0.01*blur,uv.y-0.01*blur)) +
warp_21=`GetPixel(float2(uv.x,uv.y-0.01*blur)) +
warp_22=`GetPixel(float2(uv.x,uv.y+0.01*blur)) +
warp_23=`GetPixel(float2(uv.x-0.01*blur,uv.y)) +
warp_24=`GetPixel(float2(uv.x+0.01*blur,uv.y)));
warp_25=`//add a 'bass overbright' effect:
warp_26=`ret-=-(lum(ret)<sin(time*90))*ret*blur+(lum(ret)>sin(-time*90))*ret*blur;
warp_27=`}
comp_1=`
comp_2=`
comp_3=`
comp_4=`
comp_5=`shader_body
comp_6=`{
comp_7=`    uv = 0.05 + 0.9*uv;
comp_8=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_9=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
comp_10=`                      ((uv.xyy*q28
comp_11=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
comp_12=`                      ).xyz*
comp_13=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
comp_14=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q31
comp_15=`                     );
comp_16=`if(ret.x> q26*q13         && ret.x<= q23*q11        )ret.z -= (noise9).x*.5; 
comp_17=`if(ret.y> q25*q11         && ret.y<= q22*q12        )ret.x -= (noise9).y*.5; 
comp_18=`if(ret.z> q24*q12         && ret.z<= q21*q13        )ret.y -= (noise9).z*.5; 
comp_19=`      // SUPER GLOW EDGES - looks awesome w/octopus
comp_20=`      float3 avg_col = GetBlur3(uv);
comp_21=`      ret = abs(avg_col - ret)*6;
comp_22=`    ret *= 1.333; // a little bit of overbright
comp_23=`}
